channel.title: Is the smoothwan image for RPI 4 work for RPI CM4 as well?
channel.description: Hi, may i know if the image for RPI 4 work for RPI CM4 as well since there is difficulty to get RPI 4.

item.title: Is the smoothwan image for RPI 4 work for RPI CM4 as well?

item.title: Is the smoothwan image for RPI 4 work for RPI CM4 as well?
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Yes it does with the exception of one of the USB 2.0 ports, I think that needs extra configuration, maybe not on the latest release.
